sect1.title: Usage
sect1.para: Lowers a figure window indicated by the figure number. The syntax for its use is figlower(fignum) where fignum is the number of the figure to lower. The figure will be lowerd to the bottom of the GUI stack (meaning that it we be behind other windows). Note that this function does not cause fignum to become the current figure, you must use the figure command for that. Similarly, if fignum is the current figure, it will remain the current figure (even though the figure is now behind others).
